chain.description: The current weather in San Francisco is overcast clouds with a temperature of 13.3°C. There are no active alerts for the location at the moment. However, I'm sorry, but I am unable to fetch the 16-day forecast for the area at the moment.

compare_candidates.description: The current weather in San Francisco is overcast clouds with a temperature of 13.3°C. There are no active alerts for the location at the moment. However, I'm sorry, but I am unable to fetch the 16-day forecast for the area at the moment.

function.name: alerts_active_for_national_weather_service
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "national_weather_service", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "A list of active alerts that can be filtered by parameters. Uses same parameters as the /alerts endpoint, but sets "active" parameter to 1 and ignores "start" and "end" parameters. The ATOM format returns items in CAP-ATOM."

function.name: alerts_parameters_for_national_weather_service
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "national_weather_service", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "A list of alerts that can be filtered by parameters. If no parameters are provided, then all alerts are returned. The ATOM format returns items in CAP-ATOM."

function.name: products_types_typeid_locations_for_national_weather_service
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "national_weather_service", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "A list of locations that have issues products for a type. Example: /products/types/AFD/locations"

typeid.description: typeId: an id of a valid product type (list forthcoming)

function.name: get_1_hour_minutely_forecast_nowcast_for_weather
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "weather", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Retrieve a 60 minute "Nowcast" for precipitation, and snowfall"

function.name: current_weather_data_of_a_location_for_weather
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "weather", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Returns the current (most recent) weather observation of a given location"

units.description: I = Imperial, S = Scientific, M = Metric (Default)

function.name: get_16_day_forecast_for_weather
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "weather", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Returns a 16 day (daily) forecast"

function.name: Finish
function.description: If you believe that you have obtained a result that can answer the task, please call this function to provide the final answer. Alternatively, if you recognize that you are unable to proceed with the task in the current state, call this function to restart. Remember: you must ALWAYS call this function at the end of your attempt, and the only part that will be shown to the user is the final answer, so it should contain sufficient information.

final_answer.description: The final answer you want to give the user. You should have this field if "return_type"=="give_answer"

2.weather: Current weather data API, and Weather forecast API - Basic access to the Weatherbit.io Weather API.
